alert.note: Alert for Bradley; East Polk; Hamilton; West Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 2:45PM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Hamilton, Bradley, and Polk counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Roads will deteriorate as Monday wears on. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Most of the precipitation is forecast to fall as snow, but periods of mixed precipitation will be possible near the Georgia state line which may produce light icing and limit snowfall totals in these areas.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bradley; East Polk; Hamilton; West Polk
